attributes.action: Extend driving theory test certificates expiring in 2020/21 by 12 months
attributes.additional_details: My son has passed his driving theory test but due to the current situation, not being able to book the driving test, his certificate will expire. He rides a motorcycle so he is fully up-to date with his road safety. Also being a brick layer he needs to be able to drive to put tools in a car. Unsafe to have these on a motorcycle. Thank you
attributes.background: To Extend driving theory test certificates expiring in 2020/21 by 12 months

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596206
